column3: Very well located comfortable property.  Staff was exceedingly personable.
Fantastic place, wonderful location, great breakfast & a warm welcome. We'll be back!
We had a wonderful time!The room was beautiful, the breakfast amazing and our host very friendly and helpful!If you want to come to Brigge, it's the perfect place to stay!
breakfast was "normal", nothing special. Location very good.

The location of this beautiful guesthouse was perfect for exploring Bruges, which in itself is a magical place. The house is wonderfully decorated and furnished with many lovely little touches. Breakfast was perfect, and the owner of the guesthouse a pleasure to speak to and very informative and helpful.
The bed was crisp, clean and extra comfy. The breakfast was absolutely beautifully presented. Our host Tania couldn't have been more accommodating.
Location, size of room, great attention to detail
